text.1: I have always liked jewelry. Not only the extravagant pieces but especially the ones that were different from what I had seen on someone else. So in 2015, I decided to create something new, unique, and sophisticated. And this is how Atelier Soutache was born.
text.2: Most of the jewelry that I create are unique pieces, crafted especially for you. They are the perfect element that highlights your beauty and uniqueness perfectly. I believe that being authentic and having the courage to be you is something that we should all aspire to. And the jewelry that I create is...
